values.quote: People shop and learn in a whole new way compared to just a few years ago, so marketers need to adapt or risk extinction.
values.name: Brian Halligan

values.quote: What you say about your culture will help you get candidates in the door, but what you do about culture is what defines your success.
values.name: Katie Burke

values.quote: Knowing the right thing to do and doing it are two different things. There is no partial credit for the first.
values.name: Dharmesh Shah

values.quote: Functional and intuitive- it allows us to quickly create great sites that are easy for clients to maintain. The CMS is easy to jump into with minimal direction, but robust enough to not limit a seasoned dev.
values.name: Tom Quinn

values.quote: The beta page-editor tool is an exciting evolution for the CMS. The foundation our developers provide paired with the flexibility in the page editor tools makes it incredibly easy for non-technical marketers to make content changes, manage overall customer experience, and ensure that their websites always keep up with UX best practices and company growth.
values.name: Kelly Molloy

values.quote: The HubSpot CMS gives a stellar out-of-the-box experience. Other CMS systems sometimes feel disjointed and it can be hard as a developer to get to what you need quickly. HubSpot CMS is easy to understand and gives the power and flexibility that modern web development expects.
values.name: Matt Fregoe
